item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:

27. Video game libraries lose legal appeal to emulate physical games online (33 points | 4 comments)
28. How I write code using Cursor (361 points | 331 comments)
29. New Mac Mini with M4 (364 points | 540 comments)
